name: Rebel Runner (itch)
description:
Rebel Runner is multiplayer infinite runner where you're doing rebellious things with rebellious pals! Choose one of four unique characters to destroy stuff, redistribute the wealth or run from the cops in the location of your choosing. 

This game was one of the 2019 Graffiti Games for PlayNYC.

Programming and Music bt @Gensuta
Art by @Takobillies 

CONTROLS

If you have controllers the controls are said the game already!
If you don't have a controller:

  • Player One
    • B to jump/submit
    • V to dash/ cancel
    • C to attack
    • Left Shift for pause/respawn
    • WASD to navigate the options
  • Player Two
    • I to jump/submit
    • O to dash/ cancel
    • P to attack
    • Right Shift for pause/respawn
    • Arrow keys to navigate options
